channel.title: Machine Learning on Rishav Mishra
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Rishav Mishra

item.title: NIT Patna
item.description: This was my 4th Internship in College. This internship was completed on 2nd of June 2021. Here I was working on a Natural Language Processing based Correction of Phrases spoken by a person project in real-time. This helped me in learning new things in Natural Language Processing and tracking a Language spoken by human for the system.

item.title: MedTourEasy
item.description: This was my Third Internship in College. This internship was completed on 1st of March 2021. Here I was working on a Customer Data of a Fitness Gym which was there from the period of past 12 years. This helped me in learning new things in Machine Learning and Statistics.

item.title: THE SPARKS FOUNDATION
item.description: This was my Second Internship in College. This internship was completed on 2nd of February 2021. Here I was working on a Tableau based Dashboard projects in real-time and some of the new and small Machine Learning contents. This helped me in learning new things in Analytics Domain and some ML technologies.

item.title: BVG INDIA LTD.
item.description: This was my First Internship in College. This internship was completed on 12th of October 2021. Here I was working on a computer vision based attendance system project in real-time camera vision. This helped me in learning new things in Computer Vision and tracking a human in the system.
